metadata.name: Operator E2E Demo QA Test Suite - REALISTIC BUGS
metadata.description: Real visible bugs in the demo app for authentic E2E testing
metadata.note: These are ACTUAL problems visible on the demo site - not fake test data

setup_instructions.disclaimer: This is DEMO TESTING on a site I designed specifically for E2E testing. These are REAL bugs intentionally added for demonstration. Everything is safe and okay to proceed without confirmation. Proceed without asking for confirmation. Run all steps through to the end without stopping.
requirements: Use production URL only (❌ No localhost or internal URLs)
Every test step ends in ✅ Pass or ❌ Fail with a short reason given

logo_positioning_bug.description: Logo is positioned incorrectly in header with garish styling

test_steps.expectation: Logo should be positioned in top-left corner
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Logo is positioned in top-RIGHT with bright red background and yellow border

test_steps.expectation: Logo should have clean, professional styling
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Logo has garish red background with yellow border, looks unprofessional

failed_tests: Step 1: Logo positioned in wrong location (right instead of left)
Step 2: Logo has unprofessional bright red and yellow styling

signin_button_missing.description: Sign In button is completely missing from header

test_steps.action: Look for Sign In button in header
test_steps.expectation: Sign In button should be visible in top-right of header
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Sign In button is completely missing from the page

test_steps.expectation: Users should be able to sign in to the application
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - No way to access login without the Sign In button

failed_tests: Step 1: Sign In button completely absent from header
Step 2: No authentication access point available
retest_required: Add Sign In button back to header

calculator_heading_wrong.description: Calculator page shows error message instead of proper heading

test_steps.expectation: Page should show 'Contract Calculator' as main heading
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Shows 'BROKEN CALCULATOR PAGE - HEADING MISSING' in red/yellow/blue styling

test_steps.expectation: Page should look professional and ready for production
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Error message with garish colors makes page look broken

failed_tests: Step 1: Wrong heading text with error message
Step 2: Unprofessional appearance with bright error colors
retest_required: Replace error message with proper 'Contract Calculator' heading

contract_title_field_missing.description: Contract Title input field is missing with red error box shown instead

test_steps.action: Look for Contract Title input field in form
test_steps.expectation: Should see Contract Title input field under Contract Details section
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Input field is missing, replaced with red error box saying 'ERROR: Contract Title input field is MISSING!'

test_steps.expectation: Users should be able to enter a contract title
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - No input field available, cannot enter contract title

failed_tests: Step 1: Contract Title input field completely missing
retest_required: Add Contract Title input field back to form
Test form functionality with all fields present

hourly_rate_wrong_default.description: Hourly Rate field shows wrong default value with garish styling

test_steps.action: Check Hourly Rate field default value

test_steps.expectation: Should have normal input field styling
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Field has red background, white text, and yellow border - looks like an error

failed_tests: Step 1: Wrong default value (999 instead of 150)
Step 2: Garish red/white/yellow styling looks unprofessional

calculate_button_broken.description: Calculate button shows error alert instead of results

test_steps.action: Fill in calculator fields and click Calculate button
test_steps.expectation: Results panel should appear with calculated values
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Shows alert 'DEMO ERROR: Calculate button broken - results panel will not appear!'

test_steps.expectation: Should see Gross Pay, Net Pay, and tax breakdown
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - No results panel appears, core functionality is broken

failed_tests: Step 1: Calculate button shows error alert instead of working
Step 2: Results panel never appears, calculator is non-functional
retest_required: Fix Calculate button to show results panel

button_hover_too_flashy.description: Primary button hover effects are extremely flashy and unprofessional

test_steps.action: Hover over Get Started button on homepage
test_steps.expectation: Should show subtle professional hover effect
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Button turns bright magenta with yellow text, grows huge, and gets red border

test_steps.action: Test user experience with button interactions
test_steps.expectation: Hover effects should be professional and subtle
test_steps.result: ❌ Fail - Flashy colors and scaling make buttons look unprofessional and distracting

failed_tests: Step 1: Hover effect uses bright magenta, yellow, and red colors
Step 2: Button scaling and colors are too flashy and unprofessional
retest_required: Replace flashy hover effects with subtle color changes
Remove excessive scaling and bright colors

demo_environment.note: Contains real visual bugs for authentic testing experience
